title: S13 Ep111: Poltergeists & Possessions
itunes:title: Poltergeists & Possessions
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS is knee deep in Poltergeists & Possessions with guest Mark Stavish PLUS Theater of the Mind!

Mark Stavish, M.A., is the founder and Director of Studies of the Institute for Hermetic Studies. Established in 1998, the Institute holds instructional programs on general spirituality, esotericism, hermeticism, alchemy, Kabbalah, astrology, and parapsychology.
